name: Secret Doctrine
description:
Secret Doctrine - 3d First Person Adventure, Puzzle.Headline:Do we always know for sure where a subway car is taking us to?
Wherever it is traveling to, it is us who choose the route.
A routine trip back home turns into a course of unusual adventures for the hero of the story.



  • English - full audio, subtitles;
  • Russian - full audio, subtitles;
  • Chinese - subtitles.



  • Big Science Fiction story;
  • 3d first person adventure;
  • Puzzles;
  • For choice: classic control (keyboard + mouse + display) or VR HTC Vive headset (+ keyboard + mouse);
  • Gameplay without time limits;
  • No age restrictions;
  • Any graphic resolutions;
  • Trading Cards (coming soon).



The game is guaranteed to put you in a good mood!
You will be impressed!

Science Fiction! Puzzles! Adventures!

Minimum Requirements:
  • classic mode: GeForce GTX950 or Radeon R7 370
  • VR mode: GeForce GTX1060 or Radeon RX 470
  • DirectX 11
